question: List all antiSMASH BGC categories and their descriptions.
label: Test
answer_summary_expected: There are seven BGC categories, including Polyketide (pks), Nonribosomal peptide (nrps), Ribosomally synthesized and post-translationally modified peptide (ripp), Terpene (terpene), Saccharide (saccharide), Alkaloid (alkaloid) and Other (other)
answer_summary_LLM:
The data lists the categories of biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) identified by antiSMASH along with their descriptions. The categories include: 

1. pks - Polyketide
2. nrps - Nonribosomal peptide
3. ripp - Ribosomally synthesized and post-translationally modified peptide
4. terpene - Terpene
5. saccharide - Saccharide
6. alkaloid - Alkaloid
7. other - Other
